option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Shadow Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#0D000000"/> <!-- 5% black shadow (0D in hex = 5% opacity) --> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Main Background Layer, shifted slightly to create shadow effect --> <item android:top="2dp" android:bottom="2dp"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/icon_backround"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/cartTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="center" android:text="Contact Information" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/emailLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:layout_marginTop="120dp" android:text="Email Address:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cartTitle" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/emailEditText" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:hint=" Enter your email.." android:textStyle="italic" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/emailLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/phoneLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:text="Phone Number:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/emailEditText" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/phoneEditText" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:hint=" Enter your phone number.." android:textStyle="italic" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/phoneLabel" />
<EditText android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="true" android:textSize="20sp" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="32dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/phoneEditText" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/eReceiptTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="30dp" android:gravity="center" android:text="eReceipt" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/cartTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="center" android:text="Contact Information" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/emailLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:layout_marginTop="120dp" android:text="Email Address:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cartTitle" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/emailEditText" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:hint=" Enter your email.." android:textStyle="italic" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/emailLabel" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/phoneLabel" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:text="Phone Number:" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/emailEditText" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/phoneEditText" android:layout_width="300dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:hint=" Enter your phone number.." android:textStyle="italic" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/phoneLabel" />
<Button android:id="@+id/continueButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:background="@drawable/poppy_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/icon_text" android:padding="14dp" android:text="Continue" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="32dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/phoneEditText" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/eReceiptTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="30dp" android:gravity="center" android:text="eReceipt" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
